markdownRemark.html:
This is a cool idea - why not use Amazon's S3 device via a caching proxy with Apache2::S3 and davfs? It could even be mounted on the filesystem for easier distribution and uploads.

Its an idea! A good idea!

Somewhat related:

  • http://pmsenthilkumar.blogspot.com/2009/07/python-30-how-it-is-transitioning.html

frontmatter.title: To Do Test Apache2 S3 as a DAV Proxy with DAVFS2
